name: TeleSpy
description:
Description

The Top Secret Suitcase has been stolen by the CEO of the Corporation! Join Agent 069, tasked with retrieving the Suitcase in question, while using his Punctual Teleportation Condition to keep himself hidden. As you know, being noticed is equal to being arrested!

Instructions
  • Look for keycards on the levels to unlock the elevator.
  • Get into the elevator after collecting all the keycards.
  • Avoid being noticed!
Controls
  • WASD/Arrows: Move character around.
  • Use mouse pointer to select the teleportation direction.
Credits
